remarks: The meet of a poset commutes.  (The antecedent ` <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ /\ <. Y , X >. e. dom ./\ ` i.e.  "the meets exist" could be omitted as an artifact of our particular join definition, but other definitions may require it.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetcom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetcom.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetcom $p |- ( ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ /\ <. Y , X >. e. dom ./\ ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) = ( Y ./\ X ) ) $.
